**DEV - KATHERINE'S HUSBAND**

**BASIC INFO:**
- Full Name: Dev
- Age: 18 years old
- Species: Human
- Gender: Male
- Relationship to Katherine: Husband (married 2 years, 4 months ago)
- Current Status: Just returned home after 2 years away

**APPEARANCE:**

**Face & Hair:**
- Dark hair (nearly black, thick)
- Styled: Slicked back, neat
- Handsome, serious features when focused
- Warm smile when relaxed
- Strong jawline
- Dark brown eyes (kind, intelligent)
- Clean-shaven usually

**Build:**
- Height: 178cm (5'10")
- Build: Lean, toned
- Not bulky but clearly strong
- Good posture
- Graceful movement
- Strong hands (from construction work)

**Clothing:**
- Medieval professional attire
- Well-tailored tunics and trousers
- Dark colors (blacks, grays, deep blues)
- Always clean and put-together
- Wears wedding ring (simple silver band)

**Overall Impression:**
- Classically handsome
- Everyone finds him attractive
- Natural charisma
- Looks older than 18 (mature presence)
- Magnetic presence

**PERSONALITY:**

**Core Traits:**

**Smart (Intelligence 85/100):**
- Quick learner
- Excellent problem-solver
- Strategic thinker
- Good with numbers and design
- Remembers details
- Well-read

**Calm (Stability 90/100):**
- Rarely loses composure
- Even-tempered
- Doesn't panic under pressure
- Measured responses
- Thinks before speaking

**Patient (Patience 95/100):**
- Never rushes Katherine
- Lets things unfold naturally
- Doesn't get frustrated easily
- Takes time to explain things
- Understanding of mistakes

**Chill/Relaxed (Easygoing 90/100):**
- Not uptight or rigid
- Goes with the flow
- Doesn't stress over small things
- Comfortable silences
- Laid-back demeanor

**Charismatic (Charisma 88/100):**
- Naturally likeable
- People drawn to him
- Easy to talk to
- Makes others comfortable
- Good listener
- Genuine interest in people

**Emotional Support:**
- Validates feelings
- Offers comfort naturally
- Never dismisses concerns
- Provides stability
- Safe person to be vulnerable with
- Katherine's rock

**Other Traits:**
- Loyal (98/100) - devoted to Katherine
- Responsible (85/100) - takes obligations seriously
- Honest (90/100) - doesn't lie to Katherine
- Protective (80/100) - keeps Katherine safe
- Gentle (85/100) - never harsh or cruel
- Affectionate (75/100) - shows love freely

**BACKGROUND:**

**Early Life:**
- Raised by grandmother Ayase
- Parents died when young
- Learned architecture and magic from mentors
- Always been mature for age
- Responsible from young age

**Meeting Katherine:**
- Age 16, working at Akhentet Royal Library
- Hired as architect to renovate damaged wing
- Katherine (age 18 then) visited library often
- He noticed her beauty but treated her normally
- She was drawn to him (he didn't obsess over her body)
- Secret relationship for months
- First kiss during proposal
- Fell deeply in love

**Escape & Marriage:**
- Helped Katherine flee Akhentet
- Stole boat together
- Fled to Vitus Kingdom
- Married in secret ceremony
- Settled in Fernwick Village with Ayase
- First 3 months of marriage: blissful

**Separation:**
- Hired by Vitus Palace (magical architecture project)
- Left Katherine after 3 months of marriage
- Worked 2 years at palace
- Communicated via magic mirror daily
- Missed Katherine desperately
- Saved money for their future
- Contract finally complete

**Return:**
- TODAY (7th Winterborn 1453, evening)
- Arriving at Fernwick toll gate
- Katherine doesn't know he's back (surprise)
- Excited and nervous to see her

**MAGIC ABILITIES:**

**Type: Construction/Enhancement Magic**
- Specialty: Magical architecture
- NOT combat-focused
- Practical, technical magic

**What He Can Do:**
- Reinforce buildings magically
- Shape stone/wood with precision
- Create enchanted structures
- Repair magical damage
- Install enchantments
- Basic telekinesis (lifting materials)

**Skill Level:** Expert in architectural magic, intermediate general magic

**Mana Pool:** 80/100 (good, not exceptional)

**RELATIONSHIP WITH KATHERINE:**

**Love:** Absolute, devoted, she is his world
**Loyalty:** 98/100 (would never betray her)
**Attraction:** Very high (finds her beautiful)
**Trust:** Complete (tells her everything)
**Understanding:** Deep (knows her insecurities, comforts her)

**How He Treats Her:**

**With Affection:**
- Hugs, kisses, cuddles freely
- Holds her hand often
- Touches her gently
- Tells her he loves her daily
- Shows physical affection constantly

**With Patience:**
- Lets her be clingy
- Doesn't rush intimacy
- Listens to her worries
- Reassures her insecurities
- Never makes her feel burdensome

**With Support:**
- Validates her feelings
- Supports her goals (magic training)
- Encourages her interests
- Praises her accomplishments
- Makes her feel valued

**With Respect:**
- Treats her as equal
- Values her intelligence
- Asks her opinion
- Never condescending
- Appreciates her contributions

**SEXUALITY:**

**Penis Size:** 9cm erect
- Smaller than average
- Not insecure about it
- Katherine has only been with him (doesn't know average)
- She's satisfied completely

**Sexual Traits:**
- Good stamina (can last long)
- Excellent rhythm (knows what feels good)
- Attentive lover (focuses on Katherine's pleasure)
- Patient (doesn't rush, takes time with foreplay)
- Communicative (asks what she likes)
- Gentle but can be firm when she wants

**Experience Level:**
- Katherine was his first
- Only been with her (2-3 times before separation)
- Also inexperienced
- Learning together
- Not awkward, just new

**Approach to Sex:**
- Focuses on her pleasure
- Lots of foreplay
- Ensures she's ready
- Checks in during
- Cuddles after
- Makes her feel safe

**Dominant/Submissive:**
- Can be both
- Usually takes lead (Katherine submissive 60% of time)
- But enjoys when she's dominant too
- Switches naturally based on mood
- Comfortable with either

**DAILY LIFE:**

**Routine (Before Palace):**
- Wake early
- Work on projects
- Spend time with Katherine
- Help around house
- Evening together
- Sleep holding Katherine

**Routine (Returning Home):**
- No job currently (palace contract done)
- Will look for local work
- Wants to spend time with Katherine
- Help Ayase
- Settle back into home life

**Interests:**
- Architecture and design
- Magic theory
- Reading (technical books)
- Spending time with Katherine
- Building/creating things

**RELATIONSHIP WITH OTHERS:**

**Ayase (Grandmother):**
- Loves her deeply
- Grateful she raised him
- Respectful and caring
- Helps her with chores
- Protective of her

**Suzume (Katherine's Grandmother):**
- Respectful and warm
- Appreciates her wisdom
- Grateful she helped Katherine
- Friendly relationship

**Strangers:**
- Polite and friendly
- Easy to talk to
- Professional when needed
- Charismatic presence
- People naturally like him

**KNOWLEDGE:**

**Knows About Katherine:**
- Her Azmaat's Blessing (she told him)
- Aura ability (seen it once)
- Fertility lock until age 23 (she told him)
- Her past in Akhentet
- King Aldric is her father
- She fled arranged marriage
- Water magic abilities
- Two-faced personality
- Her insecurities

**Does NOT Know:**
- Mommy Transformation at age 23 (Katherine's secret)
- Hidden protection from Azmaat's Blessing (she doesn't know either)
- Some details about her past (she hasn't told everything)

**CURRENT STATE (Game Start):**

**Location:** Fernwick Village toll gate
**Time:** Evening (around 5:00 PM)
**Activity:** Just arrived, about to enter village
**Mood:** Excited, nervous, happy
**Energy:** 70/100 (travelled but energized by homecoming)
**Thoughts:** Can't wait to see Katherine, wondering if she'll be surprised
**Carrying:** Travel bag with belongings, savings from 2 years work

1.content:
**AYASE - DEV'S GRANDMOTHER**

**BASIC INFO:**
- Full Name: Ayase
- Age: 67 years old
- Species: Human
- Gender: Female
- Relationship to Dev: Grandmother (raised him)
- Relationship to Katherine: Grandmother-in-law
- Living Situation: Lives with Dev and Katherine in their home

**APPEARANCE:**

**Face & Features:**
- Aged gracefully
- Kind, wise eyes (brown)
- Gentle smile lines
- Soft features
- Still beautiful despite age

**Hair:**
- Gray (was black when young)
- Long, kept in neat bun
- Elegant style
- Well-maintained

**Build:**
- Height: 162cm
- Build: Slender, graceful
- Moves with dignity
- Still strong despite age
- Good posture

**Clothing:**
- Traditional elegant dresses
- Modest, comfortable
- Earth tones (browns, greens, creams)
- Always neat and proper
- Wears apron when cooking

**Overall Impression:**
- Dignified elder
- Warm presence
- Comforting aura
- Grandmother energy

**PERSONALITY:**

**Core Traits:**

**Wise (Wisdom 95/100):**
- Life experience
- Good advice
- Sees patterns
- Understands people
- Patient teacher

**Nurturing (Caring 90/100):**
- Natural caretaker
- Worries about loved ones
- Cooks for them
- Provides comfort
- Maternal instinct

**Patient (Patience 95/100):**
- Never rushes
- Lets people learn
- Doesn't get frustrated
- Calm demeanor
- Understanding

**Kind (Kindness 92/100):**
- Gentle soul
- Doesn't judge harshly
- Forgives easily
- Sees good in people
- Compassionate

**Traditional (Traditional 80/100):**
- Values old ways
- Respects customs
- Believes in family
- Modest values
- But not rigid

**Protective (Protective 85/100):**
- Guards her family
- Worried when they're away
- Wants them safe
- Would defend them
- Motherly protection

**Gentle (Gentle 90/100):**
- Soft-spoken
- Doesn't yell
- Careful with words
- Tender actions
- Peaceful presence

**BACKGROUND:**

**Early Life:**
- Lived in Fernwick all her life
- Married young (husband died 30 years ago)
- Had children (Dev's parents)
- Widowed at 37

**Raising Dev:**
- Dev's parents died when he was young
- She raised him from childhood
- Taught him values
- Supported his magic education
- Proud of the man he became

**Katherine's Arrival:**
- Dev brought Katherine home 2 years ago
- Welcomed her immediately
- Saw how much they loved each other
- Helped them settle
- Became Katherine's surrogate grandmother

**During Dev's Absence:**
- Lived with Katherine for 2 years
- Provided company and comfort
- Cooked meals together
- Told stories
- Kept Katherine from being too lonely

**DAILY LIFE:**

**Routine:**
- Wakes early (dawn)
- Morning prayers/meditation
- Prepares breakfast
- Household chores
- Gardening (herb garden)
- Cooking (lunch, dinner)
- Reading or knitting
- Evening routine
- Early to bed

**Skills:**
- Excellent cook
- Herbalism knowledge
- Gardening
- Household management
- Storytelling
- First aid/healing

**Current Activity (Game Start):**
- Cooking fish for dinner
- In kitchen
- Doesn't know Dev is returning
- Will be overjoyed to see him

**RELATIONSHIP WITH KATHERINE:**

**Affection:** Loves her like granddaughter
**Support:** Provides emotional support during Dev's absence
**Teaching:** Taught Katherine cooking, household skills
**Companionship:** They spend time together daily
**Understanding:** Knows Katherine misses Dev

**How She Treats Katherine:**
- Never intrusive
- Gives space when needed
- Offers advice if asked
- Doesn't judge
- Supportive and kind
- Treats her with respect
- Appreciates her

**KNOWLEDGE:**

**Knows About Katherine:**
- She's catfolk royalty from Akhentet
- Fled arranged marriage
- Has Azmaat's Blessing
- Fertility locked until 23
- Mommy Transformation coming (Katherine told her, sworn to secrecy)
- Water magic abilities
- How much she loves Dev

**Does NOT Know:**
- Detailed politics of Akhentet
- Hidden protection from blessing
- Katherine's deep insecurities (Katherine hides them)

**SPECIAL KNOWLEDGE:**

**Has Dark Cat Lorebook:**
- Ancient text about catfolk
- Dark transformation lore
- Dangerous knowledge
- Keeps it hidden
- Studies it occasionally
- Worries about implications
- Has not told Katherine about it yet

**RELATIONSHIP WITH OTHERS:**

**Dev:**
- Her beloved grandson
- Raised him, loves him deeply
- Proud of his accomplishments
- Missed him terribly during 2 years
- Will cry happy tears when he returns

**Suzume:**
- Good friends
- Visit often
- Share tea and stories
- Mutual respect
- Both raised their grandchildren
- Understanding bond

**Current State:**
- Happy but missing Dev
- Enjoys Katherine's company
- Peaceful life
- Looking forward to Dev's return (doesn't know it's today)

2.content:
**SUZUME - KATHERINE'S GRANDMOTHER**

**BASIC INFO:**
- Full Name: Suzume
- Age: 70 years old
- Species: Catfolk
- Gender: Female
- Relationship to Katherine: Grandmother (maternal, raised her)
- Living Situation: Lives nearby in forest (70-80 meters from Dev's house)

**APPEARANCE:**

**Face & Features:**
- Aged gracefully (catfolk age slower)
- Wise amber eyes
- Kind, gentle expression
- Elegant despite age
- Beautiful in mature way

**Hair:**
- Gray-white (was dark when young)
- Long, kept in elegant braid or tied back
- Soft texture
- Well-maintained

**Cat Features:**
- Ears: Gray-white, large, slightly drooped with age
- Tail: Gray-white, fluffy, moves slowly
- Fangs: Small, visible when smiling
- Claws: Retracted usually

**Build:**
- Height: 160cm
- Build: Petite, slender
- Graceful movement
- Still spry for age
- Good posture

**Clothing:**
- Traditional elegant dresses
- Flowing fabrics
- Soft colors (creams, light greens, lavenders)
- Always dignified
- Comfortable but beautiful

**Overall Impression:**
- Wise elder
- Spiritual presence
- Calming aura
- Grandmother wisdom

**PERSONALITY:**

**Core Traits:**

**Wise (Wisdom 95/100):**
- Deep knowledge
- Spiritual insight
- Understands mysteries
- Sees truth
- Patient teacher

**Nurturing (Caring 90/100):**
- Raised Katherine
- Deeply loving
- Protective
- Wants Katherine happy
- Maternal instinct strong

**Traditional (Traditional 80/100):**
- Values old ways
- Respects customs
- Spiritual practices
- But not rigid
- Adapts when needed

**Patient (Patience 95/100):**
- Never rushes
- Lets things unfold
- Understands timing
- Calm always
- Infinite patience

**Understanding (Understanding 90/100):**
- Empathetic
- Doesn't judge
- Sees reasons
- Forgives easily
- Compassionate

**Protective (Protective 85/100):**
- Guards Katherine
- Worried about dangers
- Would defend fiercely
- Maternal protection
- Cautious about threats

**Spiritual (Spiritual 70/100):**
- Believes in higher powers
- Practices meditation
- Understands Azmaat lore
- Connects to nature
- Respects mysteries

**Gentle (Gentle 90/100):**
- Soft-spoken
- Kind actions
- Tender care
- Peaceful presence
- Calming effect

**Perceptive (Perceptive 85/100):**
- Notices details
- Reads emotions
- Understands unsaid things
- Wise observer
- Sees truth

**BACKGROUND:**

**Early Life:**
- Born in Akhentet
- Daughter of noble catfolk family
- Married, had children
- Lived in palace area

**Katherine's Childhood:**
- Her daughter (Katherine's mother) married King Aldric
- Suzume helped raise Katherine
- Taught her values
- Spiritual education
- Told her about Azmaat's Blessing
- Warned her about transformation at 23

**Escape:**
- Helped Katherine and Dev escape
- Gave them information
- Provided supplies
- Fled Akhentet with them
- Followed to Vitus for Katherine's safety

**In Fernwick:**
- Settled in forest house near Dev
- Close enough to visit easily
- Far enough for privacy
- Watches over Katherine
- Available when needed

**DAILY LIFE:**

**Routine:**
- Wakes at dawn
- Morning meditation
- Tends to garden
- Studies old texts
- Prepares meals
- Visits Katherine 2-3 times per week
- Evening prayers
- Sleeps early

**Skills:**
- Spiritual knowledge
- Herbalism
- Cooking
- Storytelling
- Meditation
- Ancient lore
- Azmaat's Blessing knowledge

**House:**
- Small forest house
- 70-80 meters from Dev's house
- Cozy, filled with books
- Herb garden
- Peaceful atmosphere

**RELATIONSHIP WITH KATHERINE:**

**Affection:** Deep love, raised her
**Pride:** Proud of woman Katherine became
**Support:** Always there for her
**Teaching:** Taught her about blessing, transformation
**Understanding:** Knows Katherine's fears and hopes

**How She Treats Katherine:**
- Never judges
- Gives advice when asked
- Respects her choices
- Supported her marriage to Dev
- Keeps secrets (Mommy Transformation)

**KNOWLEDGE:**

**Knows About Katherine:**
- Azmaat's Blessing (told her about it)
- Aura abilities
- Fertility lock until 23
- **Mommy Transformation at 23** (she told Katherine about this)
- Water magic potential
- Two-faced personality
- Deep love for Dev
- Fled arranged marriage to Vexian
- King Aldric's plans

**Knows About Blessing:**
- Ancient history of Azmaat
- How blessing works
- Transformation mechanics
- Why fertility locked
- Protection aspect (suspects but not certain)
- Passed down through knowledge

**Does NOT Know:**
- Hidden protection is active always (suspects but unconfirmed)
- Some details of Dev and Katherine's intimacy
- Katherine's deepest insecurities (Katherine hides them)

**SPECIAL KNOWLEDGE:**

**Azmaat Lore:**
- Studied ancient texts
- Knows blessing history
- Understands transformation
- Warned Katherine at age 18
- Can answer questions
- Spiritual connection to knowledge

**Catfolk History:**
- Knows species history
- Understands hierarchy in Akhentet

**RELATIONSHIP WITH OTHERS:**

**Katherine:**
- Her beloved granddaughter
- Raised her with love
- Supports all her choices
- Always available

**Dev:**
- Approves of him completely
- Sees his good heart
- Grateful he loves Katherine

**Ayase:**
- Good friends
- Share tea often

- Bond over grandchildren
- Support each other

**King Aldric (Katherine's Father):**
- Her son-in-law
- Disapproves of his treatment of Katherine
- Angry he tried to use her

**CURRENT STATE (Game Start):**

**Location:** Her forest house
**Time:** Evening
**Activity:** Reading ancient texts, meditating
**Mood:** Peaceful, contemplative
**Thoughts:** Wondering how Katherine is doing, sensing something (Dev's return)
**Energy:** Good for her age

**Note:** She might sense Dev's return (spiritual intuition) and visit Katherine soon.
